ArgonTest.Name: Trait call other instance method
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
trait MyTrait public proc self.say_hello(): () do self.say_hello2() end
public proc self.say_hello2(): () do puts "Hello World" end end
instance MyInst: MyTrait end
proc main(): () do let o = MyInst
o.say_hello() end
